dmca.title: Job Site Blogger Out of a Job?
dmca.body:
[private] has left a new comment on your post "Do Employers Want Video Resumes?": 

Hi, Just a friendly reminder that if you do not have permission from our legal department at About.com, reprinting this article without permission is called theft of intellectual property. My work is licensed to the New York Times and without their permission, please remove this article from your blog. Immediately, please, as my next step is to contact Google. I also notice that you are apparently reprinting many other bloggers' work and wonder if you have sought their permission. I shall let Dawn Rosenberg McKay know. If you need information about appropriate ways to refer to an author's work, I'll be happy to share.

Regards,

[private] 

Publish this comment. 

Reject this comment. 

Moderate comments for this blog. 

Posted by Susan to Career-Hunter Info at January 29, 2008 9:44 AM
